column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ken - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you felt our ramen wasn't good. For future reference
column2: you can always ask that your ramen not contain any spicy sauce. We're never going to be all things to all people
column3: but we do try our best to accommodate every palate and preference. Thanks again
column4: and we hope you're willing to come back and try another ramen that might better suit your liking.
